title: [The Rift, Scatter]
description: Crumbling stone walls that appear ready to topple at a moment's notice rise taller than a mighty oak's height in myriad directions.  An old teddy bear has been impaled by a rusty dagger in the shadow of a nearby corner.  The floor gleams with patches of ice, perfectly reflecting the surroundings.

Crumbling stone walls that appear ready to topple at a moment's notice rise taller than a mighty oak's height in myriad directions.  An old teddy bear has been impaled by a rusty dagger in the shadow of a nearby corner.  Sparks flit through the air, dancing aimlessly across the field of view.
